devices.device_info: this is a device used to heat up food
devices.name: microwave

parameters.info: turns the microwave on or off. 1 for on. 0 for off
parameters.name: state

parameters.info: time for how long to turn the microwave on for
parameters.name: time

parameters.info: what heating level the microwave should be at. 0 for mild, 1 for warm, 2 for hot, 3 for full
parameters.name: mode

parameters.info: turns the LED on or off. 1 for on. 0 for off
parameters.name: state

parameters.info: how bright the led is. ranges between 0 and 255
parameters.name: intensity

parameters.info: warmth of the LED. ranges from 0 to 255
parameters.name: warmth
